channel.title: AWS on The Unhandled Exception Podcast
channel.description: Recent content in AWS on The Unhandled Exception Podcast

item.title: Episode 48: Coffee and Code - with Isaac Levin
item.description:
In this episode, I was joined by Isaac Levin that chat about… way too many things to put in an episode title, that’s for sure! ðŸ˜‚ We decided to not have a particular topic in mind - and just chat and see where the conversation took us! We ended up talking about podcasting, working remotely and the pandemic, general career stuff, public speaking, containers, AWS, learning, mindsets, guitars, and more!

Isaac is a .NET Developer Advocate at Amazon Web Services and a Microsoft MVP. He hosts a podcast called Coffee and Open Source, where he interviews folks from across the tech industry.
